reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish and well-made, with one mentioning it's perfect for a masquerade party. The built-in shapewear and fit receive positive feedback, with one noting there's plenty of room in the built-in cups. The zipper quality is criticized as terrible, and several customers find the dress too small. While some customers consider it worth the price, others feel it's not worth the $100 price point.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars STUNNING Dress with Built-In Shapewear â€“ Worth the Wiggle!
items.body: LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress!! I bought it to wear to the Moulin Rouge musical, and wowâ€”it delivered. I did a ton of research beforehand and was a little nervous based on the reviews, but Iâ€™m so glad I gave it a try. Based on the size chart and my 36D bra size, I ordered the size Large. Yes, getting into it is a challengeâ€”and yes, that zipper is no joke. Even with the hook closures, my husband and I couldnâ€™t get it zipped while it was on me. The only way it worked was to zip it most of the way up first, and then shimmy into it (about 3 inches from the top, then slide in). Once it was onâ€¦ holy WOW. It hugged all the right places, gave my chest a flattering lift (huge win for this mama of two), and the built-in shapewear smoothed everything out beautifully. I got so many compliments that night. Two of my friends literally ordered it after seeing me in it! It was surprisingly comfortable to sit and wear all night, which I wasnâ€™t expecting from such a sculpting piece. And major bonus points for the bathroom-access holeâ€”no wrestling out of the whole dress needed! Absolutely gorgeous, flattering, and makes you feel like a goddess. Just be ready for a little gymnastics getting into it ðŸ˜‚. Read more
items.author: Sweet Pea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress
items.body: This dress is so stunning, and the shape where is absolutely perfect, even has a hole to pee. I got so many compliments when I wore it I canâ€™t wait to wear it again. Read more
items.author: Meesh

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Zipper
items.body: Beautiful dress, but the zipper was inside out so disappointing. There was no way of zipping it up. Read more
items.author: Evelyn Mota

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great material, butâ€¦
items.body: The dress looks pretty-fabric is nice and good quality, but the dress was completely too small. I couldnâ€™t barely get it up and didnâ€™t even attempt to zip. I got another dress different style and same size, no problems getting it on. Read more
items.author: Pipersloane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Love this dress! Wearing it to my Christmas party. Very flattering and fits like a glove. Read more
items.author: katherine m thorson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs small!
items.body: I'm a medium/large and I had to get a XXL ... the bust is super small but the rest of the dress fit great. It's on the cheaper side made but it looks nice. Great for a night out. Read more
items.author: Mallory Lynch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Love this dress, I have 4 Popilush dresses and will continue to buy them they are great and fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Maria Perez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars No other garments needed to complete outfit.
items.body: Absolutely stunning. Very comfortable! Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress Formal Bodycon Sleeveless V Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Formal Bodycon Sleeveless V Neck Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige, Burgundy, Black, Caramel. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
